data.title: Subhumans, UK band not Canadian, are the Remasters any good?

data.text:
Are the remasters of the UK based Subhumans albums any good?

I am trying to rebuild some of my old punk record collection I let go of. I have been getting the old 7"s but was curious how the 2008 vinyl remasters sound.

...or go with original 80's pressings or even the mid 90's which is a mix of what I had. Anyone own both 80's and 90's and compare those? Any major differences? For this I don't mind minor, I will get whatever. But if one is clearly better I would like it.

anyone?

I picked up a few 80's pressings. a bit noisy. but Worlds Apart and Split Vision are as good as I remember. now I am really curious how the remasters sound. loss of dynamics and louder? more punchy? cleaner?
